# method
KEGG pathway KGML files and pathway related information was downloaded with KEGGREST[@Tenenbaum2021], then parsed to data.frame. P2ry12 downstream signal analysis was conducted with igraph[@Csardi2006], and visualized with ggraph[@Pedersen2021] and tidygraph[@Pedersen2020].
